body.p: To His Excy B. Magoffin Gov of the Com'th of Ky

At the fall term of the Boone Circuit Court Selva Hough was found guilty of selling whiskey to a minor without the consent of his parents_ The proof was that the minor was of a mans size and had the appearance of a man_ The law had but lately gone into force_ and form all the facts in the case it appeared that sd S. Hough did not purpor to violate the -- he is poor and but little able to pay the fine -- and a man of a good character -- in view of all which it's prayed that his fine be remitted.
Respectfully your obe'dt Ser'vt P. U. Major com'ths Atty- 8th dist-

Boone Cir. Ct
$50 } liquor to a minor
S. Hough
